references.content: Biggs, J. B. and Collis, K. (1982). Evaluating the Quality of Learning: the SOLO taxonomy. New York, Academic Press.

Cain, A. (2023, April 27). taxonomy. Encyclopedia Britannica.
Dave, R. H. (1970). Psychomotor levels in Developing and Writing Behavioral Objectives. R. J. Armstrong, ed. Tucson, Arizona: Educational Innovators Press.
Hartel, R. W. & Foegeding, E. A. (2004). Learning: Objectives, Competencies, or Outcomes? Journal of Food Science Education. Vol 3.
Mendenilla, A. (2021). A. Standards-Based Assessment [Video]. YouTube.
Simpson, E. J. (1972). The Classification of Educational Objectives in the Psychomotor Domain. Washington, DC: Gryphon House.
